title: Consistent 90 ping
body:
Hi fellas,


               Long time player, first time posting. I live in AZ, and I have a consistent 90 ping. I have run some speed tests, used the hextech repair tool and checked with others in this area. And it seems that is not what I should have. I was wondering if I could get some assistance here. If anybody is able to help out and tell me what info they need from me (Logs and such) it would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Let's try some quick and easy basic steps first! I'd like to have you check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), specifically for the steps on **Port Forwarding and DNS**. Those two options together can make it a lot easier for your network to reach our servers, so try those changes out in a custom or practice game really quickly.

If that doesn't help much, feel free to hit me back up and we can dig a little deeper into this ^_^.
Did not work my friend... Thank you for the response though! Any other ideas?

Hmmmmm alright, no worries. Go ahead and grab some of your logs, specifically network logs, and shoot those over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to sift through those to see what else might be causing issues.
